attributes.action: Like to get the whole of Westminster fired for incompetence
attributes.additional_details: Reference is incompetence of the government seen on tv
attributes.background: The Members of parliament continue to disregard a vote that was admitted to be obtained illegally. This government are not fit to run the country

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for people to lose their jobs.

You might like to sign this petition, which calls for Parliament to be dissolved.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547
